result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at localhost
The server is on port 4444
Using the browser *chrome start at http://localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the Fitnium home page at Magnetic Reason

starting at URL testpage4api.html

wait for page to load for 5 seconds

check title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page

check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true

Input Field APIs


Enter text into an input field
| enter | text | in input field | locator |

Type text into an input field
| type | text | in input field | locator |

Check an input field exists
| check | does Input Field With Id | id | Exist | true|false |

Check an input field is editable
| check | input field | locator | is Editable | true|false |

Store the contents of an input field in a variable
| store input field | locator | is editable in | var |

Store all input fields on the screen in a variable
| store all fields in | var|

Check if a series of input fields exist
| check | do input fields with ids | list | exist | true|false |

Examples

enter keith in input field form_surname
type keith in input field form_surname

check does Input Field With Id form_surname Exist true

check input field surname is Editable true
check input field uneditable is Editable false

store input field form_surname is editable in value1
store all fields in value2

check do input fields with ids form_firstname exist true
check do input fields with ids form_firstname,form_midname,form_surname,form_telephone,form_email exist true

Expand All | Collapse All
 Tear Down: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.TearDown (edit)

close the browser
